title: TCL adds five new phones to its 30 series
content:
To kick off Mobile World Congress, TCL announced a whole bunch of devices, including five new phones from its 30 series. They include the TCL 30 5G, 30 Plus, 30, 30 SE, and 30 E. The new phones are primarily for the European market. â€œThe expansion of the TCL 30 Series shows our commitment to

The post TCL adds five new phones to its 30 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: At Mobile World Congress, TCL announced a bunch of new devices, including its new flagship, the TCL 30 5G, along with four 4G phones.
